ygData.subject: Fortran interface
ygData.msgSnippet: Is there anyone that has successfully used Cantera from a standalone fortran program and could point me in the right direction? I checked out the latest source

Is there anyone that has successfully used Cantera from a standalone 
fortran program and could point me in the right direction?

I checked out the latest source code from the CVS repository and am 
able to compile it under Linux (gcc and Portland Group fortran). When 
I try to compile a simple test program:

      program demo

      use cantera

      type(phase_t) gas
      gas = importPhase('gri30.cti','gri30')

      end program

the importPhase line gives an error:

/tmp/pgf90caaaaFbvas.o(.text+0x61): In function `MAIN_':
: undefined reference to `cantera_funcs_ctfunc_importphase_'

I have little experience with programs built from both C and fortran 
source code, so any help is appreciated.

Chris Lautenberger
clauten@...
